title: Xponential fitness targets $1.935B to $1.955B North America system sales in 2025
excerpt: Discover Xponential Fitness' Q4 2024 performance highlights, strategic initiatives, and 2025 growth outlook.
text: Earnings Call Insights: Xponential Fitness (XPOF) Q4 2024 Management View CEO Mark King highlighted strong North America system-wide sales of $465 million for Q4 2024, reflecting a 21% year-over-year increase. Earnings Call Insights: Xponential Fitness (XPOF) Q4 2024

Management View

  • CEO Mark King highlighted strong North America system-wide sales of $465 million for Q4 2024, reflecting a 21% year-over-year increase. He also noted the addition of 400 franchise licenses and 464 gross new studios
